plot: A futuristic world where a game show takes ordinary people from the street and turns them into martial arts cyborgs who are controlled by video game players. Lots of action and a great twist at the end.
title: The Vancouver B Movie Factory Ep7 with Master Gee Short Film
plot_es: A futuristic world where a game show takes ordinary people from the street and turns them into martial arts cyborgs who are controlled by video game players. Lots of action and a great twist at the end.
